price: Mu nyuma, haje Firawuni n’ubugaba bwiwe, haza n’abahakanyi bo hambere yiwe, hamwe n’abantu bo mu bisagara vyimonogoje mu bugaba, barungikiwe Intumwa Luutwi (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah);
arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ

meta.transliteration: wajāa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi-ati
